result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.orig: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.html: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seomra beag in uaċtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.

result.eng: He was waiting at the house door.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.orig: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tí
result.html: Bhí sé ag fanacht ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag fanaċt ag doras an tíHe was waiting at the house door.

result.html: Conas atá do líon tíHow is your family?
result.ponchtml: Conas atá do líon tíHow is your family?

result.eng: Hurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ga: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeachtHurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ponchtml: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeaċtHurry up, the train is about to leave!

result.eng: I think the train is about to leave.
result.ga: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeachtI think the train is about to leave.
result.ponchtml: Is dóiġ liom go ḃfuil an traein ar tí imeaċtI think the train is about to leave.

result.eng: The location of the house is important.
result.html: Tá suíomh an tí tábhachtachThe location of the house is important.
result.ponchtml: Tá suíoṁ an tí táḃaċtaċThe location of the house is important.

result.eng: It is directly beside the house.
result.ga: Tá sé go díreach in aice an tí
result.orig: Tá sé go díreach in aice an tí
result.html: Tá sé go díreach in aice an tíIt is directly beside the house.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go díreaċ in aice an tíIt is directly beside the house.

result.eng: I am sharing a house with three others.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eile
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eile
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eileI am sharing a house with three others.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eileI am sharing a house with three others.

result.eng: I always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.
result.ga: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil
result.orig: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil
result.html: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáilI always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.
result.ponchtml: Téim Tí Neaċtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a ḟeiceáilI always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: I'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liom
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liom
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liomI'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liomI'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.orig: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.html: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.ga: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tí
result.orig: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tí
result.html: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tíThey were renovating the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag aṫċóiriú an tíThey were renovating the house.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.orig: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.html: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ga: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.orig: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.html: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar ḃarr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.

result.eng: Everybody in the house said in unison.
result.ga: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.orig: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.html: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéileEverybody in the house said in unison.
result.ponchtml: Arsa bunaḋ an tí as béal a ċéileEverybody in the house said in unison.

result.eng: How are you? - You can see yourself how we are.
result.ga: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féin
result.orig: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féin
result.html: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féinHow are you? - You can see yourself how we are.
result.ponchtml: Goidé mar atá siḃ - Goidé mar ḃeimis aċ mar tí tú féinHow are you? - You can see yourself how we are.
